short_description: albcontrol is an airline company based in kruje, albania.
long_description: national air traffic agency was established in 1992 as a state-owned enterprise and it was transformed into a joint stock company in 1999. on november 15 th , 2013, the company changed its name to albcontrol, air navigation services of albania. albcontrol is a 100% state owned joint stock company, property of the ministry of economy, culture and innovation. albcontrol is certified and designated by the state as the provider of air navigation services in the republic of albania. since 2003, albcontrol is a member of eurocontrol, joined canso (civil air navigation services organization) in 2009, and starting from january 2016, it is a full member of the canso europe region. ︎ anta jsc was established as a state-owned enterprise in 1992. anta sh.a. was established as state-owned enterprise in 1992. it was transformed into a joint stock company under the name of national air traffic agency on february the 3rd, 1999. this company manages and controls the airspace of albania (fir) in accordance with the international standards of air navigation.
generated_description: albcontrol, officially known as air navigation services of albania, is a 100% state-owned joint stock company based in tirana, albania. established in 1992 as a state-owned enterprise and transformed into a joint stock company in 1999, the company was renamed on november 15, 2013. albcontrol manages and controls the airspace of albania in accordance with international air navigation standards. it provides air traffic management, communication, navigation, and surveillance services, aeronautical information services, meteorological services, and flight procedure design services. since 2003, albcontrol has been a member of eurocontrol and joined canso in 2009, becoming a full member of the canso europe region in january 2016. the company is owned by the ministry of economy, culture, and innovation.
